import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { selectedStock, removeselectedStock } from '../../Redux/actions/stockActions'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import "../../../assets/styles/custom/Stock.css" const StockDetails = () => { const history = useHistory() const { StockId } = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const stock = useSelector((state) => state.stock) const [currentitem, setcurrentitem] = useState({ id: 0, stokkod: '', stokadı: '', miktar: 0, birim: '', alışfiyat: 0.0, satışfiyat: 0.0, kdv: '', İskonto: 0 }); const axiosStockDetail = async () => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:18598/api/Stok/GetSelectedStock?ID=' + StockId, { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}` } }) .catch(error => { if (error.response.status == '401') { history.push("/Login") } }) if (response != undefined) { dispatch(selectedStock(response.data)); } }; useEffect(() => { if (StockId && StockId !== "") axiosStockDetail(); return dispatch(removeselectedStock()); }, [StockId]); useEffect(() => { setcurrentitem(stock) }, [stock]); const handleChangeInput = (e) => { let data = currentitem; data.stokadı = e.target.value setcurrentitem(data) } console.log('stock: ', stock); return (
Stock Update
this.Kullanıcıadi = e.target.value} />
this.Soyisim = e.target.value} />
this.Mailadres = e.target.value} />
this.Şifre = e.target.value} />
Already have an account? Login
) } export default StockDetails;
